Commands.Field Burst: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants a low probability of inflicting Gravity Down for 5 turns.  Gravity Down lowers the required amount of hits to initate a Chase Sequence.
Commands.Energy Gain: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Makes it easier to initiate a Chase Sequence.  Grants Magical Attack Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Gae Bolg: 4-HIT AoE BRV attack + single target HP attack.  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to targets afflicted with Gravity Down.  BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.  Grants Clavat Heart for 5 turns.  Initiates a Chase Sequence and allows other targets to be launched immediately.  Clavat Heart has the following effects:  - Raises all party members' Max BRV and Attack.  - Makes it easier to initiate a Chase Sequence for all party members.

Passives.Field Burst Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Field Burst.
Passives.Smash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after initiating a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Field Burst Charge: Increases the max uses of Field Burst by 1.
Passives.Energy Gain Charge: Increases the max uses of Energy Gain by 1.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Energy Gain Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Energy Gain.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Crystal Bearer: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Smash Attack Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed for 5 turns after initiating a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Field Burst Extend: Turns Field Burst to an AoE BRV attack.Afflicts the target with Small Speed Down for 5 turns.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 5 turns after using Field Burst.BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT BRV attack with low Action Delay and raises party's BRV based on Attack.
Passives.Debuff Boost: Moderately raises Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Energy Gain Extend: Greatly raises the potency of Energy Gain.Delays target by 1 turn.

Weapons.Rampage Jegon CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Gae Bolg.
Weapons.Passio Kilanda CP: 35: Increases the potency of Energy Gain, lowers its Action Delay and makes it much more easier to initiate a Chase Sequence.Increases its max uses by 1.Raises allies' BRV based on Max BRV.Increases the potency of Magical Attack Up and extends its duration.
Weapons.Tida's Phantom CP: 15: Increases the potency of Field Burst.Raises the success rate of Gravity Down and extends its duration.
